item.description:
I am inviting members of
Coffee Talk
Meet Up Group to an afternoon of Wellness in
West Haven.

Lori Larsen, with members of her staff, will be hosting a
Meet Up at her store on Saturday, April 12 at 5:00.
Her store is across the street from the
West Haven Green.

There will be a Chair Massage.

Discussions on
Wellness,
Techniques, strategies, and Meet Up members experiences with stress,
Weight loss,
Diet,
Exercise,
Nutrition

Marcia Lawler, Wellness Coach, will be giving
Past Life Regression
Intuitive Readings
Talking to the Other Side

All Meet Up Members are invited to look at her Meet Up link of

http://weightloss.mee...

weightloss.meetup.com/463/?gj=sj3

If you want to go there before this Meet Up then you are invited
By Lori to come by after calling her at (203) 933-2200.

Also in her store is the Healthy Habit Caf√©.

Meet Up members are encouraged to try some of the
Cafes drinks and food.

For more information, please read

http://www.catchaheal...

www.catchahealthyhabit.com/

Being from West Haven, I am aware of the parking
Problems on Campbell Avenue.
I am also aware of parking areas
That others might not be aware of or use.
Most of the time, I use the large parking area that is behind
Lori s store.

Going south on Campbell Avenue, drive past
The Look at Me Now Store
On Campbell Avenue,
turn left into the side street
Of Curtis Place next to
Marc Anthony s Pizza Italian Restaurant

There is a large parking area behind there.
Going towards Campbell Avenue from the parking lot,
you can either walk over towards
Marc Anthony s.
Then turn right on Campbell Avenue to Lori s store.

I walk over toward the right from the parking lot.
There is an alley between the buildings.
On Campbell Avenue, I turn left. Loris store is a few stores in.

This should be a healthy and fun Meet Up.

Some of us in Unknown Zone and Coffee Talk
Are already members of Look At Me Now.

Mike B
Organizer of Greater New Haven Unknown Zone

Assistant Organizer of Coffee Talk
item.how_to_find_us: The store is small enough that Members will see me in there.
item.why: This Meet Up will give you ideas on how to improve your Wellness.
item.name: West Haven April Wellness Meet Up 4/12
